snippet: Deadly attacks against United Nations personnel increased last year, claiming at least 58 lives, according to the United Nations Staff Union.
abstract: Data shows that deadly attacks against United Nations personnel increased in 2013, claiming at least 58 lives; says 33 of those killed were peacekeepers and 25 were civilians, including contractors working for the UN.
lead_paragraph: Deadly attacks against United Nations personnel increased last year, claiming at least 58 lives, according to the United Nations Staff Union.

headline.main: Deaths of United Nations Personnel Rise

keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
keywords.name: organizations
